nodes.text: "Core Talk" is an article written by Ray Vallese and Val Vallese. It consists of interviews with the creators of Coruscant and the Core Worlds, a supplement to the Star Wars Roleplaying Game from Wizards of the Coast. The interviewees are Craig Robert Carey, Chris Doyle, Jason Fry, Paul Sudlow, John Terra, and Daniel Wallace. The article is available in two parts from the Wizards of the Coast website, originally published on January 2, 2003, and February 13, 2003.
